snippet.title: Skullgirls 2nd Encore  - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Skullgirls 2nd Encore has finally arrived on your PlayStation 4!

This is the ultimate edition of Skullgirls. In addition to the game you know and love, Skullgirls 2nd Encore includes the following:

 - All DLC characters
 - Fully voiced story modes
 - New Challenges
 - New Trials
 - New Survival Mode
 - Cross-play with the PS3 and PS Vita releases
 - PlayStation 3 fightstick support
 - Full platinum trophy set

Skullgirls 2nd Encore will also be coming to PS Vita, and you can get both the PS4 and PS Vita versions for $24.99 on PSN now!
